00028 #ifndef __BLI_SMALLHASH_H__
00029 #define __BLI_SMALLHASH_H__
00030 
00035 /* a light stack-friendly hash library,
00036  * (it uses stack space for smallish hash tables) */
00037 
00038 /* based on a doubling non-chaining approach */
00039 
00040 typedef struct {
00041     uintptr_t key;
00042     void *val;
00043 } SmallHashEntry;
00044 
00045 /*how much stack space to use before dynamically allocating memory*/
00046 #define SMSTACKSIZE 521
00047 typedef struct SmallHash {
00048     SmallHashEntry *table;
00049     SmallHashEntry _stacktable[SMSTACKSIZE];
00050     SmallHashEntry _copytable[SMSTACKSIZE];
00051     SmallHashEntry *stacktable, *copytable;
00052     int used;
00053     int curhash;
00054     int size;
00055 } SmallHash;
00056 
00057 typedef struct {
00058     SmallHash *hash;
00059     int i;
00060 } SmallHashIter;
00061 
00062 void    BLI_smallhash_init(SmallHash *hash);
00063 void    BLI_smallhash_release(SmallHash *hash);
00064 void    BLI_smallhash_insert(SmallHash *hash, uintptr_t key, void *item);
00065 void    BLI_smallhash_remove(SmallHash *hash, uintptr_t key);
00066 void *  BLI_smallhash_lookup(SmallHash *hash, uintptr_t key);
00067 int     BLI_smallhash_haskey(SmallHash *hash, uintptr_t key);
00068 int     BLI_smallhash_count(SmallHash *hash);
00069 void *  BLI_smallhash_iternext(SmallHashIter *iter, uintptr_t *key);
00070 void *  BLI_smallhash_iternew(SmallHash *hash, SmallHashIter *iter, uintptr_t *key);
00071 /* void BLI_smallhash_print(SmallHash *hash); */ /* UNUSED */
00072 
00073 #endif /* __BLI_SMALLHASH_H__ */
